title: Ramping Soft Signal Control
description: This function block implements a soft ramping control for a signal based on input conditions. It allows for a gradual increase or decrease of an output value while adhering to specified ramping times for both on and off transitions.
name: RMP_SOFT

input.name: IN
input.description: Boolean input that triggers the ramping action.

input.name: VAL
input.description: The target value to ramp towards.

input.name: PT_ON
input.description: The ramping time when increasing the output value.

input.name: PT_OFF
input.description: The ramping time when decreasing the output value.

output.name: OUT
output.description: The output value that gets ramped up or down based on the input conditions.
